title: Tell us your Live / Play story
body:
https://youtu.be/aVijgcPQIXE

By now, you've probably seen the recent Live / Play documentary that follows the touching stories of different players from around the world. Each of them are unified by one thing in common: League of Legends. 

Previously, we asked you to submit your own unique tales that connect you and those around you with the game. We're still looking for stories to tell, so come share them with us through this [LINK](https://docs.google.com/a/riotgames.com/forms/d/1o0aUITnU7kFNylPmIjrkAZjzhCBnuEnZQ3Iwmb6NM2k/viewform)!

Would love to see OCE players featured on future videos!

replies.body: Like my life, my story about League will be interesting.

I'll leave my story.

I'm a community event coordinator, content creator, social media manager, and wannabe Rioter.

I've been playing for 5 years, and been a part of OCE's community since before OCE existed, we just called it Australia. 

I live in the middle of nowhere, beautiful outback Australia, where I've found a small weekend job in Retail, which I'm using to fund my passion, serving the community.

I'm doing my best to find, and create opportunities to prove, and improve my skills, through a crappy network connection, in the bush.
